overview: DoÄŸacan loves to solve problems on the massive scale and felt social networks held a unique challenge. Unlike traditional data sets, social networking data required a completely new approach, in that they presented a complete fragmentation of data on a massive scale - It was a problem that could not be solved with conventional architecture. He’s been at nsyght since the beginning and is excited to be the driving force behind nsyght’s real time infrastructure. He’s contributed to various open-source projects and has been an Apache Nutch committer since 2007.
